message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value for us at $1,200,000, but considering its potential impact on your endeavors, we believe it's worth every penny. We are offering this remarkable asset to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is a strategic move to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer.
